about:
Hey! I'm Evan, a 14 year old at CVHS! I am a swimmer, an artist, and a viola player, and look forward to my time on this forum :D.

In the future, I want to pursue a career as an athlete or a graphic designer or engineer. Maybe a scientist, preferable an astronomer :).

A couple of things I like
This server
Swimming
Drawing
and 3am deep talks in the back of people's trucks C;

Things I dislike
Tumblr girls
unoriginality
pop music
Idk just annoying people in general, people who bother me too much, and people who don't know how to live enough.

My favorite things in this world are Cheezits and Sprite. Anyone touches them and they get their hand chopped off.

My info page is Kinda like a huge "Why do I need to know this"

EAT A STEAK MANNNN

I SEXUALLY IDENTIFY AS A TOASTER
IGNS
Add me on league and carry me out of bronze: CrushedThy (NA Server)
My minecraft is Ezou
Osu!: Ezou, Don't look at my classic mode stats they're shit ;n;

Personal contact
If you need to personally contact me, you can holler and I'll give you my snapchat. There is one person in the forums here that knows my Facebook and that's by sister but I'll give it to you if I REALLY trust you.

But those I will always answer.
interests: Swimming, Viola, Doodling, League of Legends, being really bad at life.
